overview: David Park is an Associate of Allied Minds, Inc. He has extensive experience in opportunity assessment, research, marketing, and business plan development. Before joining Allied Minds, David led product launches and other strategic initiatives as a Business Sponsor at Donovan Data Systems, the leading system and services provider to the advertising industry. Previously, he consulted for Fortune 100 companies in financial services, aerospace, and pharmaceuticals. Prior to management and technology consulting, he led projects at Novartis Pharmaceuticals Corporation as a member of their Leadership Development Program. David earned an MBA and an MSIS at Boston University Graduate School of Management, as well as a CSS in Accounting and Finance at Harvard University, and a BA in International Relations at Tufts University.
